caption: I really enjoyed talking with @magnus_carlsen about the lifelong obsession he’s had with chess, and the state of the game.  He’s a very interesting and friendly guy, and it’s always fun to try to pick the brain of such a high level performer.  Thank you also to my brother @tonyhinchcliffe for sitting in with us.  Tony loves chess, so it was a big treat for him as well.  Podcast available now on @spotify and everywhere else!
